metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35229 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An authenticated user can create a link with reflected Javascript code inside it for the discovery page and send it to other users. The payload can be executed only with a known CSRF token value of the victim, which is changed periodically and is difficult to predict.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
